14.text: One vowel many sounds many sounds one vowel one is a short sound, book, cook, bull and full. The other is a long sound, spoon, broom, blue and true.
14.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>One vowel many sounds many sounds one vowel one is a short sound, book, cook, bull and full. The other is a long sound, spoon, broom, blue and true.</prosody></speak>

15.text: Read the poem aloud and ask the students to repeat. With the highlighted words, explain the difference between the long and the short vowel sounds | u | and |u:|.
15.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Read the poem aloud and ask the students to repeat. With the highlighted words, explain the difference between the long and the short vowel sounds | u | and |u:|.</prosody></speak>
